issue.title: [Rust] Master branch broken build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9846](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9846). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Master branch is failing to build in CI. It fails to compile "tower-balance-0.3.0". I cannot reproduce locally.
```java

error[E0502]: cannot borrow `self` as immutable because it is also borrowed as mutable
       --> /Users/runner/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/tower-balance-0.3.0/src/pool/mod.rs:381:21 
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9846?focusedCommentId=17186880) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
I observe in the past that this happens in my fork's master from time to time.

 

I believe that it is caused by caching.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9846?focusedCommentId=17191941) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
`[~andygrove]`, should we mark this as can't reproduce, as master is fixed for some time now? I do not know how I would approach this.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9846?focusedCommentId=17585972) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
